summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight fluctuations in pH and temperature.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; consider adding buffers if pH drops further.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain below 500 ppm for optimal plant and fish health.
Aim to keep temperature between 24°C and 28°C; consider heating if temperatures drop further.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.005 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 332.651 / 307.8 / 342.1 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.48 / 20.94 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
